name: Tottoko Dungeon
description:
◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇
tottoko dungeon release first anniversary!

It's small, but you can get this in Sprite's room.
Gold and Gold which can be bought at accounting, in period limitation two times!

Gold which can be acquired at the stage also is also in 1.5 times of period limitation!

The equipment which couldn't be strengthened so far this chance is trained, and.
Please do!

◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇

◆◇◆◇Dungeon-quest style running action game◇◆◇◆
Easy to play simply by tapping with single-handed operation!
Beat up and down within dungeons toward a goal!
New type of dungeon-quest running action game.

▼Simple operation!
Characters start running toward a goal without any complicated operation. All you need is to direct them by tapping and help them explore the dungeon!
...【Climb】 stairs in front of the character or 【go straight】...
...【Go back】 the same street or 【go straight ahead】...
...Face a battle with a tough enemy 【as it is】 or 【with improved fighting capability】...

▼Many treasures may be found in dungeons!?
With your help, the characters can find various weapons, protectors and special skills.
These items listed above are necessary for exploring the dungeons and beating a gigantic boss!
Let's explore every corner of the dungeons and find the items.

▼On completion of all the treasure boxes...
You may get a little treat...?

▼Recommended to persons who:
・like pixel graphics game!
・like to grow a character diligently!
・like to capture a complicated dungeon!
・like changing clothes!
・like Indiegames!
